text: The 1953–54 season was the 74th season of competitive football by Rangers. ==Overview== Rangers played a total of 46 competitive matches during the 1953–54 season. ==Results== All results are written with Rangers' score first. ===Scottish League Division A=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font- size:100%; text-align:center" !Date!!Opponent!!Venue!!Result!!Attendance!!Scorers |-
